Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated and fixed the Image Editor, and enhanced the install wizard for a better user experience on large displays!
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Windows XP and Beyond... Minimum Full HD Display Size

English.Keywords: word processor, spreadsheet, application, photo, editor, office, word, spreadsheet application, full, HD
English.Char_Desc_45: Premium office suite for FHD and UHD monitors
English.Char_Desc_80: Free premium and professional office suite for FHD and UHD monitors.
English.Char_Desc_250: Designed for the discerning professional, office worker, or student, this office suite features enhanced interfaces optimized for intuitive use and improved visibility on Full HD and UHD widescreen displays.
English.Char_Desc_450: Crafted for the discerning professional, office worker, or student, this office suite offers enlarged, user-friendly interfaces that enhance navigation and visibility across Full HD, UHD 4K, and 8K widescreen monitors. It operates fully without requiring .NET or Java, conserving valuable disk space and system resources.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite OmegaOffice FHD+ is tailored for professionals and discerning users seeking a refined computing experience. Its enhanced, full-screen interfaces are optimized for better visibility and intuitive interaction on Full HD, UHD, and widescreen monitors.
Tabbed document views make navigating open files effortless, while thumbnail previews provide clear visual overviews of your content. Whether you're creating PDFs, image documents, print layouts, or something more personal, like a thesis, letter, or greeting card, SSuite OmegaOffice streamlines the entire process!
SSuite WordGraph Editor FHD
WordGraph offers advanced formatting tools that give you precise control over text, page, and document structure. It supports a wide range of industry-standard formats and allows exports to PDF, JPG, BMP, PNG, GIF, and the native SSP presentation format.
Try it Online: https://writer.ssuiteoffice.com/
Designed with streamlined navigation and vibrant, user-friendly interfaces (no more than three levels deep), WordGraph helps you draft and organize documents more efficiently and with less effort.
SSuite Accel Spreadsheet FHD
Accel is a robust spreadsheet solution equipped with the tools needed to calculate, analyze, and visualize data through reports or vibrant 2D/3D charts. Easily import external data via ODBC, sort information, and perform advanced statistical analysis.
Try it Online: https://calc.ssuiteoffice.com/
The built-in Chart Wizard lets you choose from over eight chart types, line, pie, column, area, XY, stock, and more, each with multiple variations to suit your presentation needs.
Full Office Suite Online: https://spartan.ssuiteoffice.com/
...
No Java or .NET required. Lightweight, efficient, and eco-friendly!
Green Energy Software, saving the planet one bit at a time...
